content.detailedDescription: Last night, at 9:25pm,  my wife and i were just getting back from running in a mud run. she had just went inside and a group of 4 lights happened to catch my eye. which i thought was a little odd at first because they were flying in an approximate diamond formation. but then even more odd was they were closely followed by another group of 3 lights. i then called my wife back out to check them out. by the time she came back out the first two groups had moved out of sight. the first groups were followed by more lights (all were orange/red in color) but now they were flying in pairs. this continued for 7-8 min for a total of about 15-20 objects. i tried to use video on my phone but it doesn't film well at night. i was able to view through some binoculars and the lights weren't flashing as they do on a plane. an obvious plane was in the sky at the same time and flying in the direction of the lights so we had something to compare to. the planes lights were flashing red/white and was flying west to east. the flight of strange lights were flying se to north about 20-30 degrees above the horizon. we lost sight of them as they flew into cloud cover to the north. we found the whole thing to be odd and hopefully easily explained
content.summary: Saw flight of 4 lights at first that caught my attention.

content.detailedDescription:
Upon editing photos, discovered the attached object.  several attachments included:

raw image from sd card, edited photo for clarity, and google maps imagery/info for location.
content.summary: Taking long exposure photos in parkway.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to film lightning storm with new camera was playing with settings while filming went in side to view on computer and seen the ufo the next day went out to feed chickens and found one dead all intact but all the insides were gone no marks on it at all just feathers and skin
content.summary: Vidieoing lightning in sky and didnt know had it untill i went in next day chicken was all gone but feathers,bone and skin still all intack

content.detailedDescription:
A few minutes after 10:00p on may 25, 2014, my family and i turned off of route 33 onto lovers lane (route 1101) and observed 5 orange/yellow/sun-like colored orbs approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter traveling south to north, following lovers lane, approximately 300 feet in the air. as we slowly traveled south on lovers lane (approximately 5 mph), a row of trees blocked our view of the orbs. once passing the trees, we then observed only 3 orbs in a triangular formation with one orb leading and the two other orbs behind, where all 3 appeared equidistant. all three orbs remained in perfect formation, slowing traveling north at approximately 10 mph, unwavering, as if they were on a track. as the orbs traveled, the front orb slowly faded, as if on dimmer switch, until it completely disappeared, which was evident when stars showed where it once was.
once the two back orbs reached the location where the front orb started to fade, they too started to fade and disappeared at the same location as the front orb. my son took a picture at 10:10p with his apple iphone but the picture is completely blank/white (attached).
content.summary: 5 orange/yellow orbs

content.detailedDescription: Was driving east on hwy 72 in rolla, mo and saw a ball of white/clear light to my right (south). i knew it wasent a plane or star or the moon or anything like that. i watched it for a few mineutrs and then we drove past some trees and when i looked back at the spot ware it was it was gone. no ware to be seen. step  dad was in the car but i didnt say anything about it to him.
content.summary: Small white/clear ball of light in rolla, mo.

content.detailedDescription: For the past two years i have been waking up with burn marks on my arms, and hands in the shape of what looks like letters, dots, and lines. i have found large strange shaped bruises on my body with absolutely no recollection of how it got there. i have seen flashes of lights in the sky above my home, and i hear high pitched humming noises the day before i wake up with these strange marks on my body. i don't remember being taken, and i haven't seen them face to face. i leave all of the lights on in my home and have trouble going to sleep because i feel like i am being watched. i don't know what is going on and i was hoping some one could help me.
content.summary: I think i am being abducted in my sleep and left with no memory afterwards.

content.detailedDescription: Bonjour !Nous sommes en 1998 & ces un soir d'hivers,au quã©bec & je me trouve en plein bois,a la zec wessonneau,au lac geoffrion,je suis a mon chalet en vacances avec ma conjointe de l'ã©poque.Ce soir la on dã©cide d'allã© faire une promenade en motoneige,je dois traverser le lac,d'une grandeur de 1 kilometre x 1 kilometre,rendu au centre du lac ,me dirigant vers le nord-est,j'ai apercu 3 lumiã¨res qui formait 1 triangle,l'ovni ã©tait,stationnaire & au-dessus de la cime des arbres,j'ai arreter brusquement la motoneige ,et j'ai demandã© a ma copine si elle voyait ce que je voyais,elle me rã©pond que ,oui,j'ã©tait ã©merveillã© devant se spectacle fantastique,tout ã©tait silencieux dans les alentours ,je suis persuadã© que j'observe un ovni,apres quelques, 4 a 5 minutes,je reparti la motoneige,pour m'avancer vers l'ovni,& ces a ce moment ,qu'il disparu en 1 fraction de secondes,cette journã©e la ,il avait neigã©,toute la journã©e,& que nous ã©tions seul sur le lac geoffrion qui compte 32 chalets,& que je connais cet endroit depuis 27 ans a l'ã©poque,je suis un astronome amatteur,depuis l'age de 7 ans,& cet endroit,est sans lumiere de villes ou, autres.Ces endroit idã©al pour observã© le ciel ã©toilã©.Apres cet observation, je me sius rendu a l'endroit ou j'avais vue l'ovni & au sol il n'y avait aucune trace quelconque dans la neige fraiche,a ce moment la,je n'avait plus de doutte,c'ã©tait bien un ovni!Ca ma rendu tres euphorique,au contaire de mon amie,qui elle avait peur.Ce que je ne savais pas ce soir la ,ces que j'aurai ,1 autre observation,que je ferai en 2009,en mauricie au quã©bec,dans le petit village de charette,1 soir d'hiver,j'observait les ã©toiles ,depuis prãªt de 1 heure a l'arriere de la maison de mes parents,il fait tres froid ce soir la - 35 degrã©s celcius,& je suis sur le point d' entrã©e pour me rã©chauffã©,que cet a ce moment que j'aperã§oit,un grosse boule lumineuse de couleur orangã©,elle se dã©place,en zigzag,un peu comme une bulle de savon qui flotte dans l'air,je regarde en direction nord-ouest,& la boule orangã© se dã©place vers le nord-est,elle se dã©place sur une distance de 2 kilometres,a une altitudes au dã©but de, 200 pieds ,avec une montã©e lente de 20 degrã©,rendu a 2 kilometres ,du point de dã©part,elle devient un point rouge ,plus petits & laisse une trainã©e pareil comme un laser,apres elle devient vert vif, encore plus petit en laissant une trainã© pareil a 1 laser,tout ca, sans bruit & a une vitesse folles,je me met a sauter dans les air fou de joie ,d'avoir observer cela,wow, wow, je capote ,je suis totalement euphorique !!!Je sais vraiment que cela ne vient pas de la terre cet une technologie tellement avancã© sur nous,qu'apres avoir vu cela je ne suis plus jamais ã©tã© le meme,par rapport a mes croyance spirituelle ,& je cris tout haut,que nous ne sommes pas seul dans l'univers,avec tellement de joie,je me sens prã©vilã©giã© d'avoir pu observã© cela,& apres j'ai dã©buter ,des recherches por trouver d'autres preuve que nous ne sommes pas seul, & croyer moi ,j'ai plusieurs preuves photographiques a l'appui,exemple les photo de la cometes tchouri,par esa,son des photo que j'observe a l'aide de grossissement ,logiciel,grande ã©cran de tv, une grosse loupe fixã©e au bureau,ces de cette facon que je fait mes recherches, ces incroyable combien je peu voi des structures,des vaisseaux spatials,je vois cette cometes comme une grosse ruche d'abeilles,il a de la vie partout sur ce cailloux,j'en vois plein qui tourne autour.Aujourd'hui ,le 26 juillet,2015 merci ,de m'avoir lu & bonne observation !!!!!
content.summary: C'ã©tait stationnaire au dessus des arbres,3 lumieres en formes de triangles

content.detailedDescription: Last night, i was laying on my bed by our 280 degree windows with my cat at the foot of my bed. my cat started looking behind me, and following something with his head, like he was playing with a light. i looked be hind me and there were giant circular lights shining through the clouds moving in circles. there were about 4 and they would individually move in a circle, then disappear, then move in a circle, then disappear. this pattern went on for about an hour. i went and woke my sister, and she saw it too.
content.summary: Moving circle lights above portland oregon

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my room with my girlfriend who was pregnant at the time with our son quite close to the due date anyway i went down stairs for a cigarette in the back garden when i noticed a very bright sphere to the east of me it didn't seem too far away it wasn't moving just there it was like the way you would see the moon or a star but this want a moon or a star i've never seen that ball of light thing since anyway next thing i notice was silent craft coming past me in the sky very silent just flashing red white blue triangular it was gong very slow like drifting then i saw another one and another one they were close together going similar speed it was weird because there was no noise it was about 6 to 8 of them all spread out i thought that's i've never seen anything like it i don't live next to an airport neither i felt excited i shouted up to my girlfriend to come an have a look by the time she come down she could see them too they were travelling toward the west of us slowly moving off in to the distance she got scared and went back in the house i just watched in awe i didn't even think to get a camera i just watched, i had a dog at the time i found it strange that she didn't come out in the back garden as she normally does when i go out for a smoke i didn't report it at the time because i didn't know who to report it to i had no photo/video evidence it was very quiet out in the back at the time of the event like no one else was around i didn't want to start asking neighbours i case they thought i was weird as i'd not long moved in to the property,i've always remembered it that ball of light sphere thing just stayed stationery there that's what made it more weird it stayed till next day next night it wasn't there i have never experienced anything like that since i have always wanted to tell the story whatever it was it was very strange no noise nothing .
content.summary: Silent star crafts in the night

content.detailedDescription:
I was in us army radio school at fort knox, ky on an oct afternoon in 1956.  we were outside on break since it was a nice clear day. someone said 'hey, look over there' there were 2 ufos stationary about 1/2 mile or less away & about 500 - 1,000 feet off the ground.  they were cylindrical in shape with a small dome on the top & appeared metallic -about 50 - 75 feet in diameter.  they just sat there for close to 10 minutes when they both accelerated at an unbelievable speed & were out of site within a few seconds with no noise or trail. within a minute 3 jet fighters came from the area of the airfield & appeared to be pursuing them.
there were almost 200 witness (the whole class). i never heard any more about this. it made a believer out of me.  in my life i was a state police officer for 22 years & saw quite a few odd lights in the sky during all those years but never put much stock in them but this episode was, for me, very, very real - they were there.  anyway, for your info & old records.
content.summary: Observed 2 ufos stationary then left at unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription:
1. graveyard shift working security outside.
2. looked up at the stars as i tend to do sometimes and noticed one "star" moving very slowly until i made the realization that it wasn't a star.
3. i thought it was a star. it was probably deep in space, maybe?
4. object looked very small in the sky, but if it was deep in space, it could actually be pretty big up close i would imagine. movement was very sporadic and not drone-like. it would ascend and descend at fast rates. very often made circle movements. moved like a moth under a light.
5. it gave me goosebumps. now this was probably my eyes playing tricks on me because i was straining them in order to see this object, but whenever i blinked, there were flashes of light casted on the tops of the trees in front of me. i didn't list this, but i could've sworn i saw a projected beam but didn't list this as i'm not sure if that was my eyes playing tricks on me. when i stared at the object, i saw visions of the orb in the eyes of random animals. for instance, i would see very distant smoke/clouds in the shape of a shark, and as the shark's eye, was the object. very strange but could've been my eyes playing tricks on me. 
6. object stayed in the sky for a while. lost sight of it when the sun came up. which further makes me believe this object was in space.
content.summary: Star-like object with white, blue, and red flashes; moved sporadically at times

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog out on the front lawn for a bathroom break. the moon was directly observable and low in the sky. as i looked at it, directly to the right was what i assumed a twinkling reddish-orange light, perhaps venus. i soon noticed it was actually moving toward my location. planes and helicopters often flyover, so i wasn't surprised until i noticed that the twinkling lights were too numerous to be landing lights. there was neither variation in color, nor any blinking, and no engine noise that would be expected at low altitude. the speed of the object was consistent with a helicopter or small plane.

as the object came closer, the lights began flickering out over 3/4 of the object until a single point of light remained, which also faded out completely. by this time the object was directly overhead and i could still discern the outline against the sky. it was black, opaque, and shaped like an isosceles triangle. i'm certain of the shape as i turned around to watch it go over the house i lost it for a moment, when i refocused, the object had changed location to the point where i determined its path was not a straight line. shortly thereafter i lost sight of the object over the trees.

from the lighting behavior, it is possible this was some sort of meteorite, but that doesn't explain the angular shape nor its flight pattern. my wife proposed it was a b-2 stealth aircraft but that doesn't explain why it'd be lit inconsistently over civilian airspace... and while they're both triangular, this object was not shaped like a b-2.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing object fading to black triangle

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at 2 am to get water. saw a bright star, south, then all of a sudden it moved to the left and back. i thought it was a star. it flashed, like a light moved around it. it darted back and forth, then would sit still, then went in a circular motion, then sit. it was exciting when i realized it had more motion than a star has. fascinating, i watched it for 15 minutes before it moved farther south and out of sight. i love to watch stars, this was not a star
content.summary: 2am looked out saw a star, then it moved left and  back then in circle, flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were taking out the trash when we noticed 8 lights arising above the trees in the direction of fanning ,mo. and they appeared to be taking off in a north east direction,they appeared to be in a formation of 1 then 3 then 3 then 1 ,there was no sound,no blinking of any lights,the objects were just like glowing ovals,at a mile away i could only guess the objects were at minimum ,maybe 11 to 25 ft,each,no jetstream,just silent.As we noticed them one appeared then 3 and 3 and 1 and it was as if they were at a 25 degree angle,and they were all steady,no variation in line,or movement,like they were one unit ,they came above the treeline and asended at a slight rate and within a few seconds were gone...It was just awesome,but we did not want to tell any authorities,so we just kept it in the family,i didnt even know there was an org. that you could tell until i seen you on face book just now....I seen a different sighting in roswell nm. in 2007,it was a silver orb that me and 5 truck drivers seen hoovering just 200 ft above the ground at the truck stop ,it was just hoovering for a good hour,and then it just poof gone...We tried to get pictures but it was like you could see it but could not photograph it,the camera could not see it...When you snapped a picture ,it was just the sky,but the object was still there...Sounds crazy but we all tried to get a pic of it to prove what we saw and we couldn't...It was odd...Oh the report i did on the top of this page i can draw from memory if needed,but i did not get any pics as i did not expect to see that while dumping trash...
content.summary: Was at approx.9 pm,and was taking out trash when my wife and i turned to go back to the trailer,we noticed at least 8 lights in the pattern of 1 then 3 then 3 then 1 all in a take off angle ,and appeared to be coming from fanning area of crawford county.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were going back to my house in elk grove, when i got distracted by these 3 lights that looked unusual.  i ask my friend do you see that?  we were almost to the house and we were still watching the lights.  my friend thought they may have been lights from a tower, but there are no towers in that area. i was thinking they may have been drones.  but why would there be 3 drones hovering.  i did not hear a sound come from the lights. i was able to snap off a few pictures.  when we got closer to the house the lights were disappearing behind the tree coverage.  i just don't know what to think.
content.summary: 3 hovering objects in elk grove, ca

content.detailedDescription: The ufo looked like a small circle in the sky, clear in color at first; when it first appeared (almost like it was invisible) then it took on a grey color, silver color, and a metallic color.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I looked in the sky and saw a ufo just appear. i jumped out of my chair and startled my girlfriend. i pointed it out to her and ran in the house and grabbed my binoculars. when i came out she was still watching it and i gave her the binoculars. she watche

content.detailedDescription:
Smoking a cig in the backyard watching stars when different color orbs caught my attention. looked like a bright satellite until it stopped then moved again and had weird flight pattern but kept its direction. i thought maybe helicopter with one light searching for something but there was no sound. every time the neighbors dogs bark we go out and look for more. isn't the first object and probably won't be the last we will see.
camera not good enough for pictures but it looks really cool maybe we're not prepared enough.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light orbs going up coastline maybe searching

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place on september 21st of 2013, approximate time was 7:30pm. i was riding on my bike going home from the convenient store and normally i would ride home taking the street saddle south towards my houses street but instead i had a sudden feeling to turn left going east to take dublin street so i did and about half way on dublin just before it starts to curve north east i seen these 4-5 bright white orbs moving in the sky. all 4-5 orbs would emit a trail of sparks as it appeared, nothing like fire and i can't recall if when emitting sparks whether it made sound or not, also there was no particular order of emitting sparks/glowing/disappearing etc.

when the orbs weren't emitting these sparks, sometimes they'd turn off the white glow and very faintly they would appear blue and about the size of the stars if looking at the night sky while still moving. then from being a blue light they'd start glowing white then sometimes emitting the sparks at random as it appeared to me. so in the video when they seem to disappear they were actually turning into the small blue orbs.

i took a photo then took the video afterwards. at the time i was using my t-mobile samsung galaxy cell phone which had a 1.5 megapixel camera so i had to turn night mode on as well increase the brightness just so that these objects would appear on my screen. picking up the emitted sparks was a no go unfortunately.

they started to move more north-north east in the sky and while descending turning off and on the white glow to blue glow they no longer were emitting the sparks in this process. i faintly seen a light shooting off from the ground up into the sky north-north east towards these orbs direction and it seemed as though the orbs were descending downward within the area and one in the center of this long beam of light. once the last object was out of sight the beam of light vanished.

this is the end of my sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4-5 orbs glowing brightly white, emitting sparks & then appearing small blue star like size of light.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in the door way of my van, looking west at the cloud cover, noticed a small black dot appear through the clouds in the distance and continued to move toward my location, watched it grow to the size of a small bus in a matter of 2-3 seconds. noted that it looked rectangular, but, tapering away at the trailing end. noted that it appeared to resemble a 'lego' effect covering.
noted it slow down and seemed to scan me, when i stared and shouted at it.
my wife saw it at this time, do this. there was no beam scanning, i only felt it 'read me' leaving a small fear for it.
the object made no sound (completely silent)
the object had no rotors or engines sound / or visible.

it then zipped away over the building i was parked next to, towards greater london.

found it very difficult to sleep after visual for 3 days.

hope this helps . . .  some how.
content.summary: Dot on horizon to over headin 3 seconds, and continued towards london.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room cleaning up. i went out the back door wich is connected to my room as i used to live in a basement living with my parents . as i walked out of the pool area i opened the gate and at that moment i noticed strange lights hovering above the neighbors barn. i figured it was nothing so i kept walking to the end of the driveway about 30 feet from the house. i then was curious what the lights were so i looked up again. the craft was north east from my driveway hovering about as high as a grown oak tree as we have many on the property. i dropped the garbage bag and walked up to the object looking straight up the object was about 10 feet from the driveway.  as i walked up to the craft  i observed it as the orange red lights which were at the bottom of the triangle and the greenish light was at the tip of the craft. the craft was not moving at this point but it would rotate counter clock wise slowly. the lights on the craft were just bright enough to see a solid black frame which was the triangle itself with specs of white lights kind of polka doted on the craft. the main light that we're green,yellow,red did not look like they were connected to the craft. now as i stood there for about 1 minute approximately two black helicopters approached the craft on each side. these copters did not have any lights but were loud and could clearly see the shape of the copter. the two copters then tuned off and flew out  of sight. after these chain of events i ran to the front of the house and told my brother and my dad to come out i was scared as i did not know what was going on . as my brother and father stood on the front door step i had lost all sight of the craft so i convinced them to stay in case the craft came back as it was cold and they both thought i was nuts . after about two minutes of walking on the front yard the craft then moved from the same direction the farm was behind the house,it went over the house and turned south as the craft did not change altitude but seemed to sag to the left. the craft then slowly disappeared into the tree line. what was very interesting is it looked like the craft was just flying right through the trees as if they weren't even there before we lost sight of the object.Whenever the craft moved it moved very slowly in a sluggish motion.All of us were so focused on looking at the craft so no pictures or film was presented . thank you mufon i am happy that i could share my experience.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft with multi colored lights caught my eye

content.detailedDescription: After the power went out at around 9:00pm, whole area went dark, i went out on balcony to see fire trucks in front of our resort, looked up to see stars since no light pollution now, trying to identify constellations, when saw this v-formation of lights fly directly overhead, right over roof top of our building, south end of virginia beach, watched it go from right to left, sourh to north, silent, swift, not navy jets because totally silent and too close, not birds because too fast for brown pelicans to be gliding by, or ducks or geese who make noise as they fly, do these birds even fly at night?  was going through all what it could have been, coming up negative every time.  v-formation consisted of barely visible spherical balls of silvery lights, with a sort of light rainbow fuzzy haze surrounding and trailing them.  it was its own light because power outage no ground light to reflect with. lost sight of it when it went beyond the building.  as of this writing, officials do not know what caused the power outage in our area, which was restored by 1:18am.  when i saw the v-formation, i was wondering when the power would return, and i got a mental image of "1:00".  i told everyone "let's see if the power comes back on at 1:00".  naval air station nearby, could it be a new experimental fighter jet like the stealth bomber?  earlier that afternoon, a virginia state police helicopter was flying low, up and down the beach, several passes.  we all wondered what it was looking for.  was this a real ufo disabled flying too low trailing a haze that caused the power outage?  i was the sole eye witness.
content.summary: V-formation lights directly overhead above turtle cay resort flight silent

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend just got to his house. we sat down on his back deck where it's pitch black and he lit a cigarette. i look in the sky and seen a shooting star and he had also seen one in another spot about the same time. he walked in the house but i stayed out on the deck. i kept watching, hoping to see something else. being out in the county i figured i might get lucky. i seen 2 or 3 more shooting stars and then 2 airplanes and i even heard the first one. i knew they were planes.I started watching the stars again and it got pretty still. i was looking in the opposite direction of the big dipper and i seen a dot so small i thought it was a star. then i noticed it was moving. it was moving fast because it was so far away but it covered a lot of sky. it almost looked as if it was weaving through the stars like it was dodging them or something. i tracked the object fir about 30 to 45 seconds when i lost sight of it. i stayed an extra 10 15 minutes outside trying to find it but i had no luck. i could feel the hair on my neck stand up and my heart was beating pretty fast. if you have any questions, you can contact me through facebook. search keeg meister and you'll find me sticking up my middle finger. message me. its not a very big sighting or anything but i feel like it did it on purpose because once my friend went in the house, i i used my phone screen as like a signal to see if anything happened. i doubt they'd see that from that far away but i saw the object right after i put my phone up cause i started feeling stupid. again, it looked exactly like a star and it did nit move in a straight line. almost like it was weaving between the stars.
content.summary: I seen some shooting stars i think and 2 planes and i thought i seen a star moving but it was moving weird like wavy a cross the sky

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on my coach, watching tv, i noticed a glowing fireball in be sky. having seeing his object multiple times in the past, i rushed out to look. in the last, there was always one glowing object. this time, there were two, about 10-30 seconds after each other. the first time i witnessed this many months ago, i thought it was a plane on fire. i was able to predict what was going to happens based on passed sightings. just as predicted, the first ball stopped it's slow motion, sat there for a moment, then slowly disappeared, still flickering as it did this. the second fireball did exactly the same 10-30 seconds later. this was the 4th time a sighting like his has occurred in the last year, and the first time i spotted two of the objects. others who have seen it in my area have said its just the space station passing by, i have my doubts. very curious as to what these objects might be.
content.summary: 2 glowing fireballs moved in my direction, stopped in the sky, and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting home after working the 3-11 pm shift at the hospital in town. i was diving up the road of the trailor park where i lived. i noticed lights coming across a small field directly towards me. my first thought as i turned into my driveway stepping out of my car was, that seems too low for an airplane and it's too quiet. as i stood watching, these lights came closer,slowly and eventually stopping directly overhead. this craft was barely 100 feet overhead, i could have hit it with a rock. this craft barely made a sound at first, much lower than a hum, difficult to describe. no downdraft at all and the trees directly below it weren't moving.As i stood there frozen, i remember thinking ,i have to remember everything about what i was seeing. the craft was sort of oval shape. i was looking directly above. the craft was very black, difficult to make out the exact edges. it was about 100 feet long and maybe 35 to 40 feet wide. bluefish white lights shining outward from each end and side. a solid small deep red light underneath and it appeared to be very slightly wobbling reminded me of how a magnet wobbles when you try to float it over a repelling magnet. as i stood there i realized that my knees were actually knocking together and i was shaking. as i looked around the park. i saw that no other homes had there lights on at this time of about 11:30 pm. i thought, what if this thing kills me or takes me, no one would know what happened. i ran up my driveway and hid down behind my car. this seemed almost funny to me later as i thought about it. as i continued to watch it, the craft slowly, quietly began to move at the same height along the park road towards the main road. i'm not sure where i got the courage but i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i got in my car and headed towards the main road. when i drove out of the woods into the open at the main road the craft was on the other side of the street hovering at tree top level. i shut off my engine and got out and stood on the hood looking at this now side view craft. it still appeared very dark but i could see that it had 3 small lights spaced quite a ways apart blinking in success, 1 red 1 blue and 1 green. it also had what looked like small dimly yellowish internally illuminateing lit windows running the lenght of the craft. it hovered there with me starring at it for what seemed like a minute or two then slowly starting moving off in a southerly direction following the main road back towards town. i got in my car and headed in the same direction. this thing was traveling just above the trees off to my right about 200 feet. it was matching my speed of 60 mph and followed alongside for about a mile and veered off out of sight. a couple miles further down the road i turned into the parking lot of a closed small town store where i could look out over a large valley type area. a few moments later i saw the same craft which was now about a quarter mile away do a big arc over the valley and fly out of sight. i started driving home, i was so wound up and excited that i just wanted to call someone and tell them what i had just experienced. as i was driving home, i saw the object in my review mirror about a half mile behind me. i stopped the car and got out. i watched it again veer off and fly out of sight. i drove the couple miles home and as i was turning into my yard, the craft flew over the far end of the park at a much faster speed than before and out of sight. i sat outside on the deck for quite a while that night but did not see it again. this entire experience lasted about 45 minutes. even though this sighting occurred 22 years ago, i still can remember vivid details and how i felt. even while writing this, it still seems impossible and difficult for me to accept.But it is absoulatel true and the strangest thing i have ever experienced.
content.summary: Came across field and hovered directly overhead about 100 feet, played cat and mouse next 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription: We were in the mountains on vacation near creste butte near taylor lake. object was only observed after looking through pictures.
content.summary: Shape was observed only after picture was taken.

content.detailedDescription: Let me start off by saying i have clear video of this sighting. i was at my radio control flying sight. i was flying my remote control b-17 and videoing the flight with my mobius action cam (1080p). at the time there was two other guy' flying planes, one to my left and one to my right. no one including my saw anything out of the ordinary while we was flying. it wasn't until i got home and was viewing the flight footage that i saw the ufo streak across the sky. it came from behind us and traveled a straight path right across the flying field. it was silent and fast. i'm uploading the video..At mark 5:35 the ufo appears and streaks across the sky. i need to let u know i have video editing software for the purpose of making flight video's of my rc airplanes..I'm attaching the original video and a close up edited version i shared with my buddies on facebook
content.summary: Was flying and videoing my b-17 rc airplane. got home and viewed the video and that's when i seen the ufo streak across the sky right above me. i have the video

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting into my family's car to go to a restaurant when i spotted the ufo. i was looking at the moon originally, it was the evening and the daylight sky was just starting to darken. 
i didn't know what it was when i first saw it. it was too skinny to be a blimp, but too slow to be an airplane. plus, it didn't have any wings.
i asked my dad to look at it since he was an ex-pilot, and he had no idea what it was either.
i wanted to go and get my binoculars but my family was waiting to go to the restaurant, so i decided just to hop into the car. i kept looking at it through the car, but i lost sight of it. 
the ufo did not make any noises, moved somewhat slowly.
it was cigar shaped with a grey body and orange and red lights all along the cigar in a line. it moved in a straight line. 
i have pictures, although in the pictures it just looks like a blurry white dot. when in reality it wasn't even white.
you can see the moon next to the object.
(no, it wasn't venus. venus doesn't move)
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo spotted with orange and red lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was at dusk. a very large, maybe even cruse ship size slowly turning dark low profile triangular shape. with dare i say.. beautiful multi colored pulsing lights. let's just say i wish i had lights like these to dance to (53 yo hippie type here) sorry lol. the flight characteristics seemed very similar to that of like a slow moving low flying tourist/surveying helicopter. it was almost right overhead, but still silent. i'm from los angeles where we have police search helicopters all the time, but up here in humboldt our police don't use them yet. so in shock, i at first thought i had spotted a police helicopter searching for something/someone. but quickly i realized it was 100% silent, unlike any helicopter i'd ever seen. i first began to thing it was 3 lights, but then could start to see the dark underside and dark triangular outline as it slowly moved overhead. it massive looking airship. i've never seen anything in my life before this, even though i was scared and am still scared of the idea.. i'm just as grateful to get a glimpse of whoever that was. maybe it's our military, who knows!?

thanks for taking my story.

coletta.
content.summary: Moved like a silent helicopter

content.detailedDescription: I am an amateur photographer that often takes photos of the moon. i take photos with a canon powershot s5 is camera. i do not recall the incident of the object. when i downloaded the images to my pc, i noticed two photos that had an object which i could not identify. the jpegs are dated september 9, 2014 and 9:21 pm and 9:23 pm. i have not altered the photos in any way. i have also attached a photo of the moon that night.
content.summary: Lighted bulbs

content.detailedDescription:
It's a sunny clear day, and the moon was visible over dayligth. 
i was watching the moon and observed a point blue initialy and aparentely following the usual approaching route to the airport. 
then i note that its speed was not similar to the usual planes. 
it give me time to find a small monocular and with them i saw a traingular shape. totally different to a plane that with the visibility conditions would be seen clearly.
sure was not a plane due to it's shape, speed, flight path.
content.summary: Bright spot on a clear day
